contentList.content:
Assist an ally in need. Remove <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENSNARED">Ensnared</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WEB">Enwebbed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEPING">Sleeping</LSTag> from a friendly target.
A successful <LSTag Tooltip="Medicine">Medicine</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Check</LSTag> will heal a <LSTag Tooltip="Downed">Downed</LSTag> friendly target for [1], while a failed check will only stabilise them.
You automatically succeed <LSTag Tooltip="Medicine">Medicine</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag> while outside of combat.
